name: Azurobe

aura.name: waterwing_dance
aura.description: Can be ridden to travel on water. Applies Water damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description: This Pal's white ribbon turns black if doused with impure water. Given its usefulness in detecting poison, this Pal was once overhunted. This past has left them bitter towards humanity.

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: bubble_blast
skills.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: hydro_laser
skills.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
